messages.messageBody:
Hello everyone,
I'm a new comer to this group and to the world of The Samurai.
I would like to know if anyone knows any websites which might inform me on fierce hand carved Noh masks?
Thank you very much.

PS If you don't know what I'm talking about, check out:
http://www.sakura-0.com/cards/


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
